section.title: What is it
section.p: This model uses genetic programming (GP) to evolve a solution to the cart centering problem. The discussion that follows assumes you are generally familiar with GP. If not, see the references later in this document.

ol.li: Run the Java application through the XhnEalontro GUI (org.primordion.xholon.app.Xhn.java), and select File --> Open --> ealontro --> CartCentering --> EcjCartCentering_xhn.xml.
Expand the Controller node in the tree.

section.title: Credits and references
section.p: This application was described in: Koza, J. (1992). Genetic Programming. p.122-147
To learn more about genetic programming (GP), start with the wikipedia page.
Visit the ECJ website to find out more about this tool.
